Posts.Content: snowmen_n_thongs wrote: was out on saturday for my 10 wedding anniversary and had a few or i should say quite a few wines and so i forgot i wasnt to do blood pressure on surgery arm my girlfriend had one at her place and stupid me tried it,, yup on that arm... since then i have been getting a really deep dull ache did i start something with my stupidity???? tracey Log in to post a reply
